website_summaries.verdict: This creamy stick foundation won't work well for all types of skin, but the coverage it offers is great for those who can wear it.
pros: Tarte's stick foundation is infused with rich nutrients and Amazonian clay
Minimizes the appearance of blemishes and discoloration and gives skin a healthy-looking glow
cons: Tends to cake after several hours of wear, especially on dry skin
If you have oily skin, you'll get best results if you set it with powder

customer_reviews.title: Fast application and great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foundation stick! Fast and easy to use. I don't often do full makeup but this little magic stick makes me want to do it more often as it covers and blends so nice. It does not cake up or settle into my laugh lines (I only wear it under my eyes then blend it out and set with a translucent powder)
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Goes on very smooth and is super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation. It feels so light on the skin, so easy to apply! Do not let negative reviews about people purchasing the wrong shade deter you from purchasing. Go to the tarte website and do their shade match quiz.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer1

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece who has eczema and is just beginning to wear makeup....tested coverage and you can't tell she's wearing makeup and covers eczema without caking!
customer_reviews.author: aafavors0313

customer_reviews.title: My favorite product for coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation! Easy to apply, great cover, flawless finish.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Stick Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Melted easily. Color was not was expected. Love starts, but this product doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shade is lighter than expected, photos do not represent shade well.
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to tell the shade of the foundation from photos of the stick. I purchased fair neutral. I have to use it as concealer due to how light it is. While I do like the feel of it on my face, I have only used it around eyes or for contour. I would like to order a darker shade but cannot tell from photos which to choose as the darker ones look orange and this one was lighter than expected. The tube container is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M. Covert

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! Way whiter than my complexion but it evens out with my tan face powder. Very nice and soft. Good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: rainesreviews

customer_reviews.title: Blends great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful foundation stick, blends beautifully. I have dry skin, and this looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!!! It goes on smooth and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: SChance

customer_reviews.title: save your money get elf
customer_reviews.text: i bought this and the elf stick save a ton of money and get the elf stick it hydrates this cakes up like crazy and it is so pale i use it for highlight now instead.
customer_reviews.author: sara moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blends beautifully, very smooth and light. Matte finish but not too flat. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

product_meta.title: Tarte Clay Stick Foundation - Fair Neutral
product_meta.description: A buildable, powder-to-liquid formula that melts into skin for medium-to-full coverage, leaving a natural finish that looks and feels just like your own skin. Microencapsulated powders then burst with your body heat to keep you shine and cake free. The vegan formula features antioxidant vitamins C and E and Amazonian clay, a total skin-balancing powerhouse that hydrates or mattifies depending on your skin type. The guilt-free blend also means there are no harsh chemicals such as talc, gluten, sulfates or parabens in your buildable, creamy coverage. Use on the go as a spot concealer or wear in lighter and darker shades to highlight and contour. Just swipe, blend and Slay with Clay.
feature_bullets: tarte Clay Stick Foundation Fair Neutral
